category.name: Audit Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_audit_track_changed_properties_only
preference.preference_description: Specifies if audit logs are written when there are no changes to any tracked attribute value. This preference applies to the Modify event type only. Valid Values: True - Audit logs are written only when a tracked attribute value changes. False - Audit logs are written irrespective of changes in tracked attribute values.
